posts.name: zyzz
posts.post: Do I Need to Work Out Every Day?

posts.name: zyzz
posts.post: How Long Should I Work Out For?

replies.name: asd
replies.post: In general, your workouts do not need to be long to be effective. Many people who are new to fitness imagine slogging around for hours on the treadmill. This doesn’t need to be the case.The length of your workout will largely depend on your fitness level, as well as the type of training and intensity you’re working out at. The CDC recommends at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity 5 days a week, as well as 2 full body strength training sessions

replies.name: asd
replies.post: Your rest will depend on your workout schedule. Like I said previously, I recommend 1 or 2 full days of rest in your schedule. This isn’t only great for giving your body time to recover from your workouts, it also can be a great time for self-care to promote mental health.
